title: Ochrence - Loose Ends EP [FLAC]
description:
Ochrence - Loose Ends EP in lossless 16-bit FLAC

Artist's description of EP from Bandcamp website:
___________________________________________________________________________________

When I released the album ochrence and looked back at all the project files for it on the computer, I realized that some of my favorite material I made during that period was either never released or never fully realized. 

This EP is mostly a continuation of the rather eclectic styles within the album, built around a re-edit of one of its tracks. It starts off with dubstep, then moves on to trap, trance, drum and bass, and ambient. It gives me an opportunity to tie up loose ends, hence the name, but I believe it also stands in its own right as well. Hope you enjoy it! 

This album is also my first release on my own digital-distribution imprint label, Adduct Records, that I founded with my friend Lucas. We're very excited to get it started, and we're currently accepting submissions from any up-and-coming electronic artists of any type at <a class="__cf_email__" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" data-cfemail="f59491918096818790969a879186b59298949c99db969a98db">[email&#160;protected]</a><script cf-hash='f9e31' type="text/javascript">
